name: Sweetness
description:
Swetness is a sweet piece of 2d game. Start your journey as a little explorer. You have to survive in this difficult world full of dangers. But do not forget that the main goal of the game is to reach the end. In the meantime, you will fulfill the main goal - you will be able to observe the beauty of the local world.

The weakness of the little explorer is sweetness. He's going to eat way too much. Remember that a lot of sweets are harmful. And if you eat it in moderation, you can restore health.

I would not like to return to the starting point of the passage. So, don't let the little explorer finish his walkthrough.

Nice animations of the game are waiting for you. And beautiful game design. Hurry up and try Little Sweet!

To return to the game on any device and not lose your progress, use Creagoo Account technologies. You can read more about it: https://live.creagoo.ru/account.
